Content:: This article documents the chronology and epidemiology of SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and is responsible for the COVID-19 pandemic, in June 2022. The first human cases of COVID-19 were identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019. WHO Weekly Report:[1] WHO Weekly Report:[44] WHO Weekly Report:[86] WHO Weekly Report:[131] WHO Weekly Report:[167] By the end of June, only the following countries and territories have not reported any cases of SARS-CoV-2 infections: Asia Oceania
Title: Timeline of the COVID-19 pandemic in June 2022 - Wikipedia
